name: DataSourceUtil

methods.name: logWarning
methods.description: Logs the error message in the debug log.

methods.name: throwException
methods.description: Throws a DataSourceException and displays the provided message to the user.

params.name: message
params.description: Error message to display to the user.

description: Parent class for the DataSource.Provider, DataSource.Connection, DataSource.Table, and DataSource.Column classes.
